name: Protect the Pumpkin (LDJam 46)
description:
A zombie virus has broken out but these are no regular zombies, due to a mutation in the virus these zombies don't crave brains but they crave pumpkins instead :o 

You need to protect these last pumpkins from being eaten by the zombies by shooting them with your gun!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 46 in about 49 hours total! Check out my entry over here

There's a lot I still wanted to add to the game but there was only so much time I could spend on it.

Hope you enjoy it (even though it could be so much more :P )
